ygData.subject: Re: Combinations for that fishing pole = 1,287 are possible (?)
ygData.msgSnippet: We can always resort to begging.    EVERYONE email EQ and tell them we are pissed that the damned Collapsible fishing pole is so damned hard to find or make.
ygData.messageBody:
We can always resort to begging. EVERYONE email EQ and tell them we are
pissed that the damned Collapsible fishing pole is so damned hard to find or
make. For the time we have put into it it should be the Equivelant of the
Fiery avenger sword or SOUFIRE. And the spyglass isn't too great! Lets
show EQ the database and how much money has been invested maybe they feel
sorry for us and give us a hint.

Second idea, That gnome that somone claims to have seen selling spyglasses.
Somone infiltrate his guild to get the damned secret. Whoever told us
about it. You volunteered. Now away brave soldier and don't come back
unless you have something!

Shmellbee Nukinfutz, povar. Master manipulator of the dead.
